name: Project Remembrance
description:
An exploration game where the player must traverse different terrains in search of lost soul fragments. Each map/scene represents a feeling or emotion(bliss, sadness, hope etc) and will test the player's sense of direction and ability to navigate effectively. Created from the techniques demonstrated in the Procedural Terrain Generation tech demo.

Press E to collect a lost fragment at a shrine.

Press F to toggle flashlight.

Press G to load next level for Debug builds.
